name: Advantage Medical Clinic (Marine Parade) East Coast

reviews.text: My colleague and I needed a vaccination urgently prior to our last minute travels. The receptionist and doctor were kind enough to wait past their closing time to administer the vaccination.  We're very appreciative to the two of them for their understanding.  Great customer service.  Thank you.
The staff really supportive and friendly. Everything done really smooth and fast. People gonna wait in air con, not sit outside to wait. Will come back Bedok branch because of supportive staff !

Dr Vivyan Tay is good , caring and details to explain difference between CHAS and Healtier SG. Hence , I transfer mine to her care including my wife signed up with her clinic. Able to explain side effect of Flu Jab.

Very professional and fast. Receptionist and all medical professionals was really friendly. Came for my mother in lawLTVP checkup. 20 mins was all it took. Kudos to the Malay receptionist lady on 21/12/24

I'm sorry, but I am not very satisfied with this service.

I was assisted by a new staff member who didn’t know what to do and didn’t ask for help. There were only two people waiting in the clinic, yet I still had to wait for a long time.

When it came to my blood test, they couldn’t find a vein on either arm. Eventually, I suggested drawing blood from the back of my hand. However, the needle was inserted too deeply, causing no blood to flow initially. They had to move the needle around before the blood finally came out.

I’m someone who isn’t afraid of needles, but I wonder how those who are scared of needles would cope in such a situation.
